title: Sky Oceans: Wings for Hire
description:
Sky Oceans: Wings For Hire is a homage to JRPG classics! Set in the open skies, experience adrenaline -filled turn-based dogfights as you take the role of captain and unite a party of rag-tag sky pirates setting upon an unforgettable, touching journey. Tech Store Simulator
Relive the charm of classic RPGs with a touching story about the search for purpose. Take the role of Glenn Windwalker as you assemble your team of sky pirates and fight against the ‘Alliance’.
Fight adversaries within the open skies in strategic turn-based dog fights. Tactically plan attacks and adapt your strategy to the ever-changing scenarios! Unlock new special moves & equipped your team with the best possible chance of victory
Assemble a party of rag tag air pirates and upgrade airships with new special abilities as you progress through a winding narrative ! Manage resources and expand your airship departments strategically. Do you have what it takes to be captain?
